name: The Best Vegan Cornbread
description: This is it. The BEST Vegan Cornbread. Just like mom used to make, but vegan! Soft, tender and sweet with just the right amount of cornbread texture.

video.name: Best Vegan Cornbread
video.description: Just the best vegan cornbread, perfect for serving with chili. Itâ€™s wonderfully moist, perfectly sweet and only requires one bowl!

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F and lightly grease a 8 x 8 pan, or a 9 inch round cake pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F and lightly grease a 8 x 8 pan, or a 9 inch round cake pan.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, sugar, salt and baking powder and stir.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, sugar, salt and baking powder and stir.

recipeInstructions.text: Now pour in the almond milk and canola oil. Stir until well combined. Pour batter into prepared pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Now pour in the almond milk and canola oil. Stir until well combined. Pour batter into prepared pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
